original_text: Gideon said to his oldest son, Jether, ‘Kill them now!’ But Jether was only a boy. He was too afraid to do anything.
korean_text: 그의 맏아들 여델에게 이르되 일어나 그들을 죽이라 하였으나 그 소년이 그의 칼을 빼지 못하였으니 이는 아직 어려서 두려워함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Gideon said to his oldest son, Jether,
But Jether was only a boy.
He was too afraid to do anything.
